Class RootRequiredAssemblyNode

java.lang.Object
  com.espertech.esper.epl.join.assemble.BaseAssemblyNode
      com.espertech.esper.epl.join.assemble.RootRequiredAssemblyNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResultAssembler
public class RootRequiredAssemblyNode
extends BaseAssemblyNode

Assembly node for an event stream that is a root with a one required child node below it.
